parameters.name: AcceleratorType
parameters.description:
Filter by accelerator type. Valid values:

*   CPU
*   GPU

parameters.name: InstanceTypes
parameters.description: The instance types to query. Separate the types with commas (,).

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order. Valid values:

*   desc: descending order.
*   asc: ascending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to query. The start value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries returned per page.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   ECS
*   Lingjun

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field based on which the results are sorted. Valid values:

*   CPU
*   GPU
*   Memory
*   GmtCreateTime
